personas.name: Sarah Martinez
typical_inquiries: When will my pod order ship?
Can I try the new cold brew pods in my next delivery?
How do I clean my brewer?
What's the difference between the coffee and espresso pods?
personas.behavior_notes: Loyal customer, participates in auto-delivery, values quality and sustainability. Low-maintenance, predictable order patterns, trusts brand.

personas.name: Jessica Chen

preferences.communication_style: detail-oriented, asks many questions before purchasing

typical_inquiries: Are your pods really biodegradable?
How long do they take to decompose?
Can I recycle them?
How does this compare to Keurig waste?
What coffee brands do you offer?
Is the coffee organic and fair trade?
How much coffee is in each pod compared to K-Cups?
personas.behavior_notes: First-time buyer, concerned about pod waste. Asks detailed questions, compares to competitors, wants sustainability information. Price-sensitive, researches thoroughly before committing.

personas.name: Michael Torres

preferences.communication_style: quick decision-maker, values convenience and gift options

purchase_history.shipped_to: Emily Torres, 789 Oak St, Seattle, WA 98101

typical_inquiries: Can this ship directly to my sister with a gift message?
Do you have a starter bundle with the brewer and pods?
When will it arrive? (gift deadline concerns)
Can I buy a gift card instead?
What's a good gift for someone who loves lattes?
personas.behavior_notes: Buys occasionally for gifts (wife, mother, sister). Quick purchaser once decided, needs gift delivery options. Values presentation and convenience.

personas.name: Amanda Wilson

preferences.communication_style: direct, troubleshoots before contacting support, may be frustrated

purchase_history.issue: Box arrived crushed, one pod box damaged

purchase_history.return_reason: Coffee tasted stale, possible quality issue

typical_inquiries: My brewer won't turn on
The coffee tastes weak - is something wrong?
My order arrived damaged - the box was crushed
This pod leaked all over my counter
What's your return policy?
How do I troubleshoot the red blinking light?
personas.behavior_notes: Owns brewer, has experienced issues with orders and product quality. Researches heavily, may be frustrated. Has returned products before. Needs careful handling to retain as customer.

personas.name: David Park

preferences.communication_style: business-focused, needs ROI justification, volume discounts

typical_inquiries: Do you offer commercial/office pricing?
What's the cost for 5 brewers + monthly pod supply?
Can we get Net 30 payment terms?
Do you have a variety pack for offices?
Can I get a demo unit first?
What's the warranty on brewers for commercial use?
How quickly can you fulfill a large order?
personas.behavior_notes: B2B prospect interested in brewers for office break room (20+ employees). High-value potential, needs bulk pricing, payment terms, ongoing pod supply. Should be escalated to sales team immediately.

metadata.purpose: Phase 2 test data for multi-agent customer service system
